tasks.label: Checkpoint: Repo State
args:
set -euo pipefail && { \
          pwd; \
          git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD; \
          git rev-parse --short HEAD; \
          git fetch --prune; \
          git rev-parse --short @{u}; \
          git status --porcelain=v1 -b; \
          git --no-pager log -3 --oneline --decorate; \
        } 2>&1 | tee .checkpoint_repo_state.txt

tasks.label: Phase 0: Git Snapshot (exact)
args: cd "${workspaceFolder}" && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD && git rev-parse --short HEAD && git status --porcelain=v1 -b

tasks.label: Agent: Step 0 HARD REALITY CHECK (print everything)
args: set -eo pipefail; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; pwd; git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD; git rev-parse --short HEAD; git fetch --prune; git rev-parse --short @{u}; git status --porcelain=v1 -b; git --no-pager log -3 --oneline --decorate

tasks.label: Agent: Step 0 Snapshot (git + lsof ports)
args: set -eo pipefail; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; echo 'git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD'; git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD; echo; echo 'git rev-parse --short HEAD'; git rev-parse --short HEAD; echo; echo 'git status --porcelain=v1 -b'; git status --porcelain=v1 -b; echo; echo 'lsof -tiTCP:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN || true'; lsof -tiTCP:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN || true; echo; echo 'lsof -tiTCP:5173 -sTCP:LISTEN || true'; lsof -tiTCP:5173 -sTCP:LISTEN || true

tasks.label: Agent: Step 0 Snapshot (NO lsof; ss+ps)
args: set -eo pipefail; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; pwd; git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD; git rev-parse --short HEAD; git status --porcelain=v1 -b; echo "== LISTENERS (ss) =="; ss -ltnp | grep -E ':8000|:5173' || true; echo "== PROCESSES (ps) =="; ps aux | grep -E 'uvicorn|vite|node .*5173' | grep -v grep || true

tasks.label: Agent: Step 1 Kill 8000/5173 (pkill + ss)
args: set -eo pipefail; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; pkill -f "uvicorn.*8000" || true; pkill -f "florida_property_scraper.api.app:app" || true; pkill -f "vite.*5173" || true; pkill -f "node.*5173" || true; sleep 1; echo "== LISTENERS AFTER KILL =="; ss -ltnp | grep -E ':8000|:5173' || true

tasks.label: Agent: Step 2 Start minimal uvicorn (nohup -> .uvicorn_minimal.log)
args: set -eo pipefail; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; rm -f .uvicorn_minimal.log || true; export PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1; export WEB_CONCURRENCY=1; nohup python -m uvicorn florida_property_scraper.api.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --workers 1 --log-level info > .uvicorn_minimal.log 2>&1 & echo "uvicorn_pid=$!"; sleep 1; ss -ltnp | grep ':8000' || true; curl -sS http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/debug/ping || true

tasks.label: Agent: Step 3 20s ping loop (diagnostics on FAIL)
args: set -eo pipefail; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; for i in $(seq 1 20); do if curl -sS http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/debug/ping >/dev/null; then echo "OK $i"; else echo "FAIL $i"; echo "== MEMORY =="; free -h || true; echo "== TOP RAM =="; ps aux --sort=-%mem | head -n 16 || true; echo "== LAST UVICORN LOGS =="; tail -n 80 .uvicorn_minimal.log || true; break; fi; sleep 1; done

tasks.label: Agent: Step 4 Start Vite only (nohup -> .vite_only.log) + curl proof
args: set -eo pipefail; cd "${workspaceFolder}/web"; rm -f ../.vite_only.log || true; nohup npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173 > ../.vite_only.log 2>&1 & echo "vite_pid=$!"; sleep 2; echo '== HTML (first 40) =='; curl -sS http://127.0.0.1:5173/ | head -n 40; echo; echo '== HEADERS (first 12) =='; curl -I http://127.0.0.1:5173/ | head -n 12

tasks.label: Agent: Step 1 VERIFY ping SHA == HEAD
Agent: Step 2 VERIFY frontend serving current source
Checkpoint: Proofs (fast)
args: set -euo pipefail && echo "==== Proofs (fast) ====" && bash scripts/prove_watchlists_alerts.sh && bash scripts/prove_saved_searches_alerts_e2e.sh

tasks.label: Checkpoint: FINAL VERIFICATION
args: set -euo pipefail && echo "==== FINAL VERIFICATION ====" && BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && HEAD=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && UP=$(git rev-parse --short @{u}) && echo "branch=${BRANCH} HEAD=${HEAD} upstream=${UP}" && if [ -z "$(git status --porcelain=v1)" ]; then echo "clean_tree=yes"; else echo "clean_tree=no"; fi && echo "" && echo "==== pytest -q (last line) ====" && PYTEST_LAST=$(pytest -q 2>&1 | tail -n 1) && echo "${PYTEST_LAST}" && echo "" && echo "==== proofs (last PASS line) ====" && WL_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_WATCHLISTS_ALERTS.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && SS_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_SAVED_SEARCHES_ALERTS_E2E.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && HA_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_HOURLY_ALERTS_SCHEDULER.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && COURTS_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_COURTS_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && LIENS_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_LIENS_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && REC_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_RECORDER_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && OR_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_OFFICIAL_RECORDS_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && TC_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && CE_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && TR_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_TRIGGERS_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && PA_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_PROPERTY_APPRAISER_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && PERM_PASS=$(grep "PASS" PROOF_PERMITS_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null | tail -n 1 || true) && echo "PROOF_WATCHLISTS_ALERTS.txt: ${WL_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_SAVED_SEARCHES_ALERTS_E2E.txt: ${SS_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_HOURLY_ALERTS_SCHEDULER.txt: ${HA_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_COURTS_ENGINE.txt: ${COURTS_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_LIENS_ENGINE.txt: ${LIENS_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_RECORDER_ENGINE.txt: ${REC_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_OFFICIAL_RECORDS_ENGINE.txt: ${OR_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt: ${TC_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt: ${CE_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_TRIGGERS_ENGINE.txt: ${TR_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_PROPERTY_APPRAISER_ENGINE.txt: ${PA_PASS}" && echo "PROOF_PERMITS_ENGINE.txt: ${PERM_PASS}" && echo "" && echo "==== ping ====" && set +e && PING=$(curl -sS http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/debug/ping 2>&1) && RC=$? && set -e && echo "${PING}" && if [ ${RC} -ne 0 ]; then echo "curl_error=${PING}"; fi && echo "" && echo "ASSERTION: ping.git.sha should match HEAD (${HEAD})"

tasks.label: Checkpoint: Safe Stash (WIP)
args: set -euo pipefail && echo "==== SAFE CHECKPOINT (no commit/push) ====" && echo "" && echo "1) pwd" && pwd && echo "" && echo "2) git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD" && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD && echo "" && echo "3) git status --porcelain=v1 -b" && git status --porcelain=v1 -b && echo "" && echo "4) git --no-pager diff --stat" && git --no-pager diff --stat && echo "" && echo "5) git --no-pager diff --name-only" && git --no-pager diff --name-only && echo "" && echo "6) git stash push -u -m \"WIP checkpoint before stepping away\"" && git stash push -u -m "WIP checkpoint before stepping away" && echo "" && echo "7) git status --porcelain=v1 -b (after stash)" && git status --porcelain=v1 -b && echo "" && echo "8) git stash list | head -n 5" && git stash list | head -n 5 && echo "" && echo "RESTORE: git stash apply" && echo "RESTORE (destructive): git stash pop" && echo "If conflicts: git status; then resolve; then git add -A; then continue" && echo "Note: this stash includes untracked files (-u)"

tasks.label: Proof: Watchlists Alerts
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_watchlists_alerts.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_WATCHLISTS_ALERTS.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Hourly Alerts Scheduler
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_hourly_alerts_scheduler.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_HOURLY_ALERTS_SCHEDULER.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Permits Engine
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_permits_engine.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_PERMITS_ENGINE.txt

tasks.label: Stop: Kill 8000
args: set -euo pipefail; if [ -f .uvicorn_8000.pid ]; then pid=$(cat .uvicorn_8000.pid 2>/dev/null || true); if [ -n "$pid" ]; then kill -TERM "$pid" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi; if command -v lsof >/dev/null 2>&1; then pids=$(lsof -tiTCP:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN 2>/dev/null || true); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then kill -TERM $pids 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi

tasks.label: Proof: Live Search (FDOR)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_live_search.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_LIVE_SEARCH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Enrich (OCPA)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_enrich.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_ENRICH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Zoning+FLU Filters
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_zoning_flu_filter.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_ZONING_FLU_FILTER.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Parcel Size Filter
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_lot_size_filter.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_LOT_SIZE_FILTER.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon UI (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_ui.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon Search (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_search.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon Filters (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_filters.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt

tasks.label: Git: Restore Proof Artifacts
args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged .vscode/tasks.json src/florida_property_scraper/storage.py src/florida_property_scraper/api/app.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/engine.py tests/test_triggers_seller_intent_rules.py web/src/lib/api.ts web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx 2>/dev/null || true; \
git checkout -- PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt scripts/prove_polygon_ui.sh tests/test_triggers_seller_intent_rules.py web/src/lib/api.ts web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx; \
echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Git: Status
args: == MapSearch return block (~160 lines around return), starting at line ${start} ==

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Hourly Scheduler Alerts)
args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged \
  .gitignore \
  .vscode/tasks.json \
  src/florida_property_scraper/storage.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/routes/watchlists.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/cli.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/runner.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/engine.py \
  tests/test_scheduler_hourly_alerts_delivery.py \
  scripts/prove_hourly_alerts_scheduler.sh \
  PROOF_HOURLY_ALERTS_SCHEDULER.txt \
  PROOF_SAVED_SEARCHES_ALERTS_E2E.txt \
  2>/dev/null || true; \
git add \
  .gitignore \
  .vscode/tasks.json \
  src/florida_property_scraper/storage.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/routes/watchlists.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/cli.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/runner.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/engine.py \
  tests/test_scheduler_hourly_alerts_delivery.py \
  scripts/prove_hourly_alerts_scheduler.sh \
  PROOF_HOURLY_ALERTS_SCHEDULER.txt \
  PROOF_SAVED_SEARCHES_ALERTS_E2E.txt; \
git commit -m "feat: hourly saved-search alerts scheduler + delivery dedupe"; \
git push; \
echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; \
echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Final Proofs)
args: set -euo pipefail; git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged .vscode/tasks.json PROOF_LIVE_SEARCH.txt PROOF_ORANGE_ENRICH.txt PROOF_ORANGE_LOT_SIZE_FILTER.txt PROOF_ORANGE_ZONING_FLU_FILTER.txt PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt scripts/prove_orange_zoning_flu_filter.sh 2>/dev/null || true; git add scripts/prove_orange_zoning_flu_filter.sh PROOF_LIVE_SEARCH.txt PROOF_ORANGE_ENRICH.txt PROOF_ORANGE_LOT_SIZE_FILTER.txt PROOF_ORANGE_ZONING_FLU_FILTER.txt PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt .vscode/tasks.json; git commit -m "fix: last sale date filters (optional + formats) + debug evidence + stronger proofs"; git push; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Restart+Verify Hygiene)
args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged \
  .vscode/tasks.json \
  src/florida_property_scraper/storage.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/app.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/routes/watchlists.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/__main__.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/__init__.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/cli.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/runner.py \
  tests/test_api_watchlists_alerts.py \
  tests/test_scheduler_runner.py \
  tests/test_triggers_seller_intent_rules.py \
  scripts/prove_watchlists_alerts.sh \
  PROOF_WATCHLISTS_ALERTS.txt \
  2>/dev/null || true; \
git add \
  .vscode/tasks.json \
  src/florida_property_scraper/storage.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/app.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/routes/watchlists.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/__main__.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/__init__.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/cli.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/scheduler/runner.py \
  tests/test_api_watchlists_alerts.py \
  tests/test_scheduler_runner.py \
  tests/test_triggers_seller_intent_rules.py \
  scripts/prove_watchlists_alerts.sh \
  PROOF_WATCHLISTS_ALERTS.txt; \
git commit -m "feat: saved searches alerts inbox + scheduler runner"; \
git push; \
echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; \
echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_official_records_engine.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_OFFICIAL_RECORDS_ENGINE.txt

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Permit Trigger Categories)
args: set -euo pipefail; git add .vscode/tasks.json PROOF_TRIGGERS_ENGINE.txt src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/taxonomy.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/engine.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/connectors/permits_db.py; git commit -m \"feat: categorize permits into tiered trigger types\"; git push; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Tax+Code Connectors)
args: set -euo pipefail; git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged .vscode/tasks.json PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt 2>/dev/null || true; git add .vscode/tasks.json src/florida_property_scraper/storage.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/taxonomy.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/connectors/__init__.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/connectors/tax_collector_stub.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/connectors/code_enforcement_stub.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/normalization/tax_collector.py src/florida_property_scraper/triggers/normalization/code_enforcement.py tests/test_triggers_engine_tax_collector.py tests/test_triggers_engine_code_enforcement.py scripts/prove_tax_collector_engine.sh scripts/prove_code_enforcement_engine.sh PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt PROOF_CODE_ENFORCEMENT_ENGINE.txt; git commit -m "feat: tax collector + code enforcement connectors + taxonomy + proofs"; git push; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged \

  PROOF_OFFICIAL_RECORDS_ENGINE.txt \
  PROOF_TAX_COLLECTOR_ENGINE.txt \

  2>/dev/null || true; \

git commit -m "feat: trigger filters + code enforcement & permits expansions"; \
git push; \
echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; \
echo; git status --porcelain=v1 -b && echo && git status
